ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dark Devil's quarry holds him at bay with a hostage of its own. Ghost's opponent, Lady Claw, reflects on her violent origins as she and Ghost prepare to battle. And Black Jaq goes one-on-one with the assassin hired by the Revenge Syndicate!
*Contents* Darkdevil: Inner Demons Part III Ghost: Ghost the Return Part 3 Blackjaq: The Revenge Syndicate Part 3 *List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Cover A (Crimebuster) | Will Meugniot | 1 | | B | Cover B (Black Terror) | Will Meugniot | 2 |
*Note* Issue #76 continuing from the original volume. The digital edition (5/20/2020) for this issue was released before the print edition.
